title: Don't lose your grip
creator_contributor_role: New South Wales. Dept. of Labour and Industry, production company

Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Materials handling - Equipment and supplies
description: Illustrates safe methods for handling and storage of rolled steel joists, angles and plates, in a typical storage area of a steel fabricating works. Suitable lifting equipment is demonstrated and reference is made to the responsibilities of crane chasers under the NSW Scaffolding and Lifts Regulations.
